OOC: I take that back, I think it was plasma.  Anyway,
I'll probably shut up now until at least
Christmas......o.k. Tankor just get it over with, go
ahead and sing Halleluah.

--- Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote:
> 
> all four get hit with rattrap taking the worst.
> obsidian and tankor shoots their cannons at rattrap 
> rattarap shoots his fusion cannon at tankor hoping
> to destroy tankor
>  Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote:
> rattrap shoots his acid gun at obsidian, his
> energy-drainers at tankor and his cannon at
> silverbolt 
> while the obsidian tankor and silverbolt shoot their
> respective cannons at rattrap 
>  Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote: OOC: 
> Sorry I took so long, but Flicker has a simple
> laser rifle as his weapon (as I recall, it's been a
> while).  By the way please e-mail me about what's
> happening too him.
>

> > Flicker::
> >

> the
